EmailTemplate.name: Community Involvement
EmailTemplate.subject: Community involvement
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you for your email. We would love to look into contributing. Please fill out our Community Involvement Request Form for this request to be under consideration: https://www.iccu.com/community-involvement-request
It has been our pleasure to help. If there is anything else we can do, please do not hesitate to contact us. Have a wonderful day!
Thank you,
{!Case.OwnerFullName}
{!Case.OwnerTitle}
Idaho Central Credit Union
Eastern Idaho 208-478-3300
Treasure Valley 208-846-7000
Magic Valley 208-733-4777
www.iccu.com
Helping members achieve financial success.
